---
id: get-dropin-ui-jwt-token

description: "This endpoint returns a JWT token (GUID) which is used to authorize requests in the Lite version of the API."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve a JWT Token for Lite API Authorization"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/auth/getdropinuijwttoken"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint returns a JWT token (GUID) which is used to authorize requests in the Lite version of the API.

<div>
  <div>
    <ApiTabs
      label={undefined}
      id={undefined}
    >
      <TabItem
        label={"200"}
        value={"200"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          A successful response containing the JWT token to be used for authentication in the Lite API.
          
          
        </div><div>
          
        </div>
      </TabItem>
    </ApiTabs>
  </div>
</div>
